dante-database-dump-intro: This page allows you to produce a dump of the '''entire database''' of this dantewiki. For more information consult [[Help:DanteBackup]].
dante-page-dump-intro: This page allows you to produce a dump of the '''content''' of this dantewiki (read: articles, files, revisions but no user accounts, system messages, system configurations and further so-called meta data). For files, content and upload actions are included. Make sure, File: pages are selected when not dumping all pages. For more information consult [[Help:DanteBackup]].
dumpform-srcfeatures: Source: What shall the dump include?
dumpform-rb: Pages: Which pages shall be included?
dumpform-ra: Revisions: Which revisions shall be included?
dumpform-up: Files: For the uploaded files, include:
dumpform-target: Target: Where shall the dump be stored?
dumpform-debug: Show debug output (only advanced users and only for AWS S3)
dbdumpform-target: Where shall the database dump be stored?
dbdumpform-features: Choose features of the database dump:
restform-restore-from-s3: Select a page dump file for restoring
prefs-aws: Credentials for Backup to AWS S3
aws-prefs-key: Access Key of an Amazon AWS IAM User with rights to write to S3. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
aws-prefs-skey: Secret Access Key of that Amazon AWS IAM User. Keep confidential. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
aws-prefs-bucket: Name of an AWS S3 bucket. Example: dantebackup.iuk.one
aws-prefs-region: Name of an AWS region. Example: eu-central-1
aws-prefs-encpw: Optional encryption password for user-controlled encryption before S3 upload. See [[Help:DanteBackup]].
